desc: Mini Melanie is your go-to bakery for every occasion and gift, shipping from Brooklyn straight to your door, with Goldbelly. Chocolate Cake Truffles, Layer Cakes, Cookie Cakes, Cake Pops, Cookie Assortments, DIY Baking Kits, Brownies. Birthdays, weddings, holidays, baby showers, gender reveals, corporate gifts.

layout.text: The Bite-Sized Treat for Every Occasion
Cake Truffles baked fresh with all natural ingredients, shipped from our Brooklyn kitchen straight to your door.
